# summary()

**Instance Method**

Generates a categorical summary of the filled column’s elements, including default values.

## Declaration

```swift
func summary() -> CategoricalSummary<FilledColumn<Base>.WrappedElement>
```

## Summarizing a Column

- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the integer column’s elements.
- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column’s elements.

items.description: Generates a numeric summary of the integer column’s elements.
items.name: numericSummary()

items.description: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column’s elements.
items.name: numericSummary()
